build.message:
Hardella 1.7.2 is now available.

  • PRU: variable initializers are not honored (previously they were just ignored)

Hardella 1.7.1 is now available.

  • Fixed: compilation errors when project is stored in a path with spaces
  • Fixed: remove unused variables in generated PruMemoryTransfer program
  • Fixed: added a compilation error when FAST_INPUTS is used in PRU1 program (only PRU0 programs can access fast inputs for now)
  • Fixed: PRU_ABZ_ENCODER.initialOffset was renamed to positionOfLastZ
  • Fixed: support for VAR_IN_OUT (for PRU and for CoDeSys)
  • Fixed: PRU1 programs (init, memory read/write) will not run if PRU0 init was skipped

Hardella 1.7.0 is now available.

  • Fixed: PRU-host communication (it was broken in 1.6.2)
  • Fixed: PDM_DW output was inversed
  • New feature: PRU cycle statistics (duration of the PRU program, and duration of PRU cycle)
  • New feature: comments after IF, ELSIF, etc

Hardella 1.6.2 is now available.

  • Case-insensitive mode for autocomplete
  • Removed extra braces from NOT expressions
  • PRU: MemoryTransfer programs was split into MemoryRead and MemoryWrite
  • PRU: pruAccessLib.lib is no longer required

Hardella 1.6.1 is now available.

  • The code is no longer red when you replace one functional block with another (e.g. when you change TON(...) to TOF(...))
  • Autoupdate is implemented. Updates from 1.6.1 to subsequent versions will be much simpler and it will download just modified files

Hardella 1.6.0 is now available.

  • Programming of both PRU is supported. You can now have a full control of 4 fast outputs and 2 fast inputs
  • The standard library is extended. Several blocks were included: step motor control, encoder, and several others
  • Block and variable comments are now visible in the autocomplete menu
